item.title: NodeJS_WeatherLocation
item.description:
Click here to see the project.

This was a personnal project that I realised inspiring myself from the tutorial of Dan Shiffman from the channel “The coding Train”. As an user you can make a drawing and send it to the base like here : and then look at the different content of the base, sort them by time or by name :

You can also take a picture with your webcam or ask the website to give you the weather at your location, save it in the base and look at a map with pointers to the locations present in the base.
